architectural_notes: Multi-page flow: Page 1 -> Page 2 (5s timed) -> Page 3
No button movement must keep the button continuously rendered/visible (avoid off-screen placement and avoid hide/show behavior).
Fireworks background should be implemented as a live bursting animation rather than a static overlay graphic.

existing_features.title: Create a Valentineâ€™s Day themed single-page React app with three distinct pages (Page 1 question, Page 2 celebration, Page 3 video finale) and clear navigation between them.

On Page 1, render the â€œYesâ€ button at approximately 3Ã— the size of the â€œNoâ€ button (e.g., width/height or overall area), while keeping both buttons readable and clickable.

Implement Page 1 â€œNoâ€ button movement behavior: the â€œNoâ€ button must not have a fixed position; it should continuously move around within the visible page area and also change to a new random position immediately when a user presses/clicks it.
Implement Page 1 â€œYesâ€ button behavior: clicking â€œYesâ€ navigates to Page 2.
Implement Page 2 UI: display the phrase â€œI knew you would say yes!!ğŸ¤­â€ prominently and include a Valentine theme with heart visuals plus fireworks-style animated background.
